#How to create a new application and use GWTChismes with maven 2.

= Introduction =

GWTChismes library is published in svn using a maven2 repository structure.
So it is easy to setup a project usin gwt-maven archetype and add gwtchismes as a depenency.


= Details =

# Create a new project using gwt-maven archetype and go to the generated folder
# Modify the generated pom.xml in order to use the appropriate gwt version.
# Add gwtchismes' repository
# Add gwtchismes' dependency
# Configure your project as an eclipse project (Optional)
# Include GWTChismes library in your gwt module
# Code your application
# Use maven to test, run, package etc. your application.
